A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Self-serving\, forced reboot. Not a sequel to The Force Awakens. Betrays the Luke Skywalker character\, and treats him like he's nothing\, Rey is a Mary Sue. The Force Awakens felt very much like a remake\, but it\, at least\, set up multiple points of interest. This movie just burns all that. How do they expect people to await the next one in anticipation\, when we basically have nothing to hope for or speculate on\, now.
